txt.en: The Filth-well of Eithel Gwaur is the source of the corruption that has long tainted the flowing waters of the Ithilduin, giving to them a new name: Morgulduin, River of Sorcery. Thanks to your efforts, in time the river may once again run clean.
#1:[placeholder]#1:{ [E]}#2:[placeholder]#3:{ [E]}#3:[placeholder], Led the Charge at Eithel Gwaur
